attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has no mandate as he was not elected leader of the party and therefore obtained the position that he currently has by proxy rather than merit.

We should have the right to choose who runs the country and not be told.

I can only see a bleak future with Gordon Brown in charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
